title: Plex Oauth Issues - RESOLVED!
subTitle: Let's make them bring back support correctly
body: It seems like Plex has broken support for us using Oauth. Currently there is a workaround but we would rather they fix the issue. Please share your feedback in this thread: Plex Oauth Discussion
author: CauseFX

title: Emby Discontinued Support
subTitle: Emby API - EmbyConnect Deprecated
body: Emby has discontinued support for matching users against Emby Connect via API. Therefore, we will no longer be supporting this method of Authentication for Organizr. If Emby decides to support this again, I will re-enable it once more. You can find more information here: Emby API Discussion
author: CauseFX

title: Welcome to Version 2.0
subTitle: We finally made it...
body: I want to thank all the alpha and beta testers.  It took us awhile but we did it!  I hope you enjoy using Organizr...
author: CauseFX

title: Testing out News Area
body: There will be news here in the future, thanks for bearing with me in the meantime throughout the v2 beta!
author: CauseFX
